alert.note: Alert for Walsh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 02 at 10:48AM CDT until May 07 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Goose River at Hillsboro affecting Traill County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Maple River near Enderlin affecting Ransom and Cass Counties. Forest River at Minto affecting Walsh County. Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94) affecting Cass County. Pembina River at Walhalla affecting Pembina and Cavalier Counties. Pembina River at Neche affecting Pembina County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Forest River at Minto. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD. During high flow, river may bypass Minto to the south and flow into Lake Ardoch. Urban flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CDT Monday the stage was 8.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.3 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
